Aaah! The rush, the delightfully, intoxicating rush, her one way to
true li=
fe! This spark was good. It is almost a pity it's all gone now.

Creep felt=
 good, and even better than last time. Her form had shifted
instantly this =
time, and she would have been ready to take on 7 or 8
of these troopers. Sh=
e felt stronger in both body and mind.

Creep: Now, boys, since I'm repaire=
d, does anyone care to tell me why
I'm here? And I don't want any slaggin' =
excuse this time, unless of
course you don't mind ending up like him.

She =
was pointing carelessly at the dead tech.
